p: We first established that the exchange of only the HA segment of H3-HA for H1 in a virus that contained all other segments from PR8 (H1N1) resulted in 100 % lethality in Tmprss2 −/− mice [virus PR8_HA(HK)]. Vice versa, replacement of the H3-HA by the H1-HA in an H3N2 background completely protected infected Tmprss2 −/− mice from body weight loss and mortality [virus HK_HA(PR8)]. These studies confirmed that the resistance phenotype in Tmprss2 −/− mice to H1N1 IAV only resides in the HA protein. This important aspect had not been addressed in any of the previous studies [ 10–12].
